name: JIRA-Categories
tagline: syntactic sugar for your gropvy scripts in JIRA
body:
### Welcome to JIRA Categories
This project was born during fighting with groovy scripts running in Script Runner (thnx Jamie Echlin) extending JIRA (thnx, Atlassian) functionality.
Trying to hide the complexity of some JIRA functionality and using Groovy's Catagory-mechanism ... 

Feel free to use the Catagories and - more important - share your experience ... every support is welcome.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
